short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and efficient allows you to resize pages quickly, for developers and people who need to see multiple pages at the same time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and efficient extension that allows you to resize web pages quickly, with a few clicks. Aimed at developers and people who need to view multiple pages at the same time.
